abilityEffect: At the end of each player's turn, each of your opponent's Active Pokémon that has any [G] Energy attached to it is now Poisoned. If that Pokémon is already Poisoned, Toxic Sludge Poké-Body does nothing to that Pokémon.

effect.en: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
